fields.description: Probability, under the assumption that the source is not noise, that at least one of the compact objects was a neutron star, that the system ejected a non-zero amount of neutron star matter, and that at least one of the compact objects has mass in the range 3-5 solar masses, respectively
Probability that at least one of the compact objects was a neutron star
